entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
